lead_paragraph: Residents are starting to fall behind California’s mandatory 25-percent water conservation target, state officials said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: California: Water Conservation Is Beginning to Lag
headline.main: California: Water Conservation Beginning to Lag

snippet: Residents are starting to fall behind California’s mandatory 25-percent water conservation target, state officials said Thursday.
abstract: California State Water Resources Control Board officials say residents are beginning to fall behind state's mandatory 25 percent water conservation target.
